content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] More Default Paint
content.description:
[ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Allows all paint mods to be selected as a default ship skin. Thanks to a script provided by $300 this now works on old and new saves, and should also work for custom game starts. The DLC specific mods are no longer necessary and can be unsubscribed.
The mod can be enabled and disabled freely. If a skin that is not one of the 8 default options is applied, and then the mod is removed, ships with that paint will still have it applied until a new default is selected. Any newly constructed ships will have the default foundation blue skin. Enabling the mod again will re-add all the skin options.
My other Default Paint mods: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2544471339]More Default Paint - Freeq's Paintjobs[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2544472001]More Default Paint - Paintjobs Galore![/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2629409510]More Default Paint - Tech Paintjobs Collection[/url]
